      com.hitmenwfm.controller.Task createTask(com.hitmenwfm.controller.Task task)

      com.hitmenwfm.controller.User createUser(com.hitmenwfm.controller.User user)
      Takes a new user in json format and adds that user to the database with the stored procedure sp_UI_CreateNewUser.

      This will take a taskid as a path parameter and delete the task from the database.

      takes no parameters/input and returns all of the tasks in the system

      This will return the template in the database with the template id specified

      Takes a username as a path parameter referring to a username that is already in the database.

      This will take a taskid as a path parameter and update the task in the database to complete It returns the Task

      This will take a taskid as a path parameter and JSON for a task object.
      com.hitmenwfm.controller.User userForgot(com.hitmenwfm.controller.PasswordInfo passwordInfo)
      This will take JSON for a username and a new password.
      com.hitmenwfm.controller.User userForgot(com.hitmenwfm.controller.UserName userName)
      Takes a username in json format and sends an email to the username's associated email with a link to reset the password.
      com.hitmenwfm.controller.User userLogin(com.hitmenwfm.controller.LoginInfo loginInfo)
      This will take JSON for a username and password.
      com.hitmenwfm.controller.User userLogin(com.hitmenwfm.controller.User user)
      This will take JSON for a user and update all of the user info based on the username It will return the User that has been updated
